title: Ticket #7831: Copy capabilities from authenticated tokens into the job classad
description:
Right now, the following information is copied from the authentication layer to the job:

  1. Identity. The authentication layer's identity gets mapped to a HTCondor identity, which subsequently goes into the job.
  2. X.509 attributes. If GSI is used, the following is copied forward:
    • DN
    • Email (if present)
    • VOMS attributes (if present)
  3. Additionally, you can provide job transforms such that some of these input attributes (such as VOMS info) get transformed into other arbitrary job attributes.

Similarly, perhaps we should copy capabilities from an IDTOKEN and/or a SCITOKEN into the job classad. All the infrastructure is in place to do so (from the prior X509 work) but is currently not implemented.
